original_text: He must pour some holy water into a bowl that someone has made from clay. He must take some dust from the floor of God's Tent. And he must put the dust into the water.
korean_text: 토기에 거룩한 물을 담고 성막 바닥의 티끌을 취하여 물에 넣고

sentences.original_text: He must pour some holy water into a bowl
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 약간의 거룩한 물을 그릇에 부어야 합니다

sentences.original_text: that someone has made from clay
He must take some dust from the floor of God's Tent
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 하나님의 장막 바닥에서 약간의 먼지를 가져와야 합니다

sentences.original_text: And he must put the dust into the water
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 먼지를 물에 넣어야 합니다
